title: Jon Meacham: "The Soul of America"
description: Michael's conversation with presidential historian Jon Meacham on his book "The Soul of America: The Battle for Our Better Angels." Original air date 7 May 2018. The book was published on 8 May 2018.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Jon Meacham, Michael Smerconish)
